title: The Look: June’s Best-Dressed List
excerpt: Here are the best-dressed celebrities of the month, including Hailey Bieber, Aimee Lou Wood, Colman Domingo, and Sydney Sweeney.
text: Charlize Theron Kayla OaddamsWhen: June 25Where: A movie premiere in Los Angeles What: Givenchy Why: Fitted to perfection. Peggy Gou Dominique CharriauWhen: June 24Where: Paris Men’s Fashion Week What: Saint Laurent Why: I love to see women in male-dominated industries tailoring. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowHailey Bieber When: June 21Where: New York City What: Paloma Wool capris, Toteme sandals, and a bag from The RowWhy: Polka dots and gingham are vying for print of the summer, and Bieber just made her choice known. Keke Palmer TheStewartofNYWhen: June 19Where: New York City What: Atelier VersaceWhy: Palmer turned this paparazzi moment into a full photo shoot—blowing kisses and striking poses, as she should. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowAyo Edebiri PG/Bauer-GriffinWhen: June 17Where: Los Angeles What: A Jacquemus dress and Jessica McCormack earrings Why: You’ve heard of the little black dress, but the little red dress? Julianne Moore TheStewartofNYWhen: June 12Where: New York City What: Schiaparelli Why: Who else is doing it like Julianne Moore? Nobody! Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowGracie AbramsStephanie AugelloWhen: June 12Where: The Songwriters Hall of Fame Induction and Awards Gala in New York City What: A Colleen Allen dress Why: Looking every bit as ethereal as she sounds. Cynthia Erivo XNY/Star MaxWhen: June 11Where: New York CityWhat: A Coach varsity jacket Why: Erivo’s style signature? Mega platforms with any and every outfit. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowLeighton Meester When: June 11Where: New York CityWhat: A Michael Kors jumpsuit Why: So many warm tones working beautifully together.Colman Domingo When: June 11Where: New York City What: A Valentino Garavani tote bag Why: This marks the second month in a row that a dapper man has made the list. Let’s keep this trend going, boys. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowAimee Lou Wood Credit: Araya Doheny PhotographyWhen: June 10Where: A screening in Los Angeles What: A Tory Burch skirt and tank top Why: Not a white lotus, but we’ll take a pink flower. Mikayla Nogueira When: June 10Where: The Business of Beauty Global Forum in Napa, California What: A Generation Love skirt and top Why: Do I need this set for work? Yes or yes?Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowMonica BarbaroNow 40% OffCredit: Raymond HallWhen: June 9Where: New York City What: Gia Studios shorts and blazer Why: This length of culotte is so hard to pull off, but you’d never know it by her effortless poise. Lily James TheStewartofNYWhen: June 9Where: New York City What: Jimmy Choo shoes Why: These shoes were made for jaywalking. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowAuli’i CravalhoMichael LoccisanoWhen: June 8Where: The Tony Awards at Radio City in New York City What: Carolina Herrera Why: I can’t imagine a more summery palette. Nico Parker Maya Dehlin SpachWhen: June 7Where: The premiere of How to Train Your Dragon in Los Angeles What: Chanel Why: Tiers, bows, and ruffles—impeccably executed.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowSydney SweeneyJose Perez/Bauer-GriffinWhen: June 4Where: New York City What: A brown pinstripe blazer dress and brown pointed-toe slingbacks Why: Why should neckties belong to men alone?
html:
Charlize Theron

When: June 25

Where: A movie premiere in Los Angeles

What: Givenchy

Why: Fitted to perfection.

Peggy Gou

When: June 24

Where: Paris Men’s Fashion Week

What: Saint Laurent

Why: I love to see women in male-dominated industries tailoring.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Hailey Bieber

When: June 21

Where: New York City

What: Paloma Wool capris, Toteme sandals, and a bag from The Row

Why: Polka dots and gingham are vying for print of the summer, and Bieber just made her choice known.

Keke Palmer

When: June 19

Where: New York City

What: Atelier Versace

Why: Palmer turned this paparazzi moment into a full photo shoot—blowing kisses and striking poses, as she should.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Ayo Edebiri

When: June 17

Where: Los Angeles

What: A Jacquemus dress and Jessica McCormack earrings

Why: You’ve heard of the little black dress, but the little red dress?

Julianne Moore

When: June 12

Where: New York City

What: Schiaparelli

Why: Who else is doing it like Julianne Moore? Nobody!

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Gracie Abrams

When: June 12

Where: The Songwriters Hall of Fame Induction and Awards Gala in New York City

What: A Colleen Allen dress

Why: Looking every bit as ethereal as she sounds.

Cynthia Erivo

When: June 11

Where: New York City

What: A Coach varsity jacket

Why: Erivo’s style signature? Mega platforms with any and every outfit.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Leighton Meester

When: June 11

Where: New York City

What: A Michael Kors jumpsuit

Why: So many warm tones working beautifully together.

Colman Domingo

When: June 11

Where: New York City

What: A Valentino Garavani tote bag

Why: This marks the second month in a row that a dapper man has made the list. Let’s keep this trend going, boys.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Aimee Lou Wood

When: June 10

Where: A screening in Los Angeles

What: A Tory Burch skirt and tank top

Why: Not a white lotus, but we’ll take a pink flower.

Mikayla Nogueira

When: June 10

Where: The Business of Beauty Global Forum in Napa, California

What: A Generation Love skirt and top

Why: Do I need this set for work? Yes or yes?

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Monica Barbaro

Now 40% Off

When: June 9

Where: New York City

What: Gia Studios shorts and blazer

Why: This length of culotte is so hard to pull off, but you’d never know it by her effortless poise.

Lily James

When: June 9

Where: New York City

What: Jimmy Choo shoes

Why: These shoes were made for jaywalking.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Auli’i Cravalho

When: June 8

Where: The Tony Awards at Radio City in New York City

What: Carolina Herrera

Why: I can’t imagine a more summery palette.

Nico Parker

When: June 7

Where: The premiere of How to Train Your Dragon in Los Angeles

What: Chanel

Why: Tiers, bows, and ruffles—impeccably executed.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Sydney Sweeney

When: June 4

Where: New York City

What: A brown pinstripe blazer dress and brown pointed-toe slingbacks

Why: Why should neckties belong to men alone?
